title: the Origin Flame
intro: Fèngyíng is the current Paragon of Huǒshén, known by others as the Empress of Holy Fire. She is described by her people as a ruler with a kind heart and is very well received by them. However, she harnesses the primal fire that has the power to scorch all enemies to ashes. While her destructive power is immense, her most sacred power is rather the opposite - the power to bring life back.

abilities.name: Origin Embers
abilities.details:
Fèngyíng's abilities ignite enemy heroes, causing them to burn over time, taking magical damage (scaling with magical power) per tick.

At three stacks, Origin Embers consumes all stacks to deal a burst of magical damage (scaling with magical power) and spread to nearby enemy heroes.

If the enemy target dies before three stacks, the burst damage will occur early. The same target cannot be applied with Origin Embers again for at least several seconds.

abilities.name: Fiery Spirits
abilities.details:
Fèngyíng launches a fire bird spirit to a target area, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies within. She can cast this ability two more times before the ability goes on cooldown.

Each cast has a timer that will put the ability on cooldowns if the next case is not on time.

abilities.name: Holy Flame
abilities.details:
Fèngyíng designates a small circular area on the ground. After a short delay, the area ignites for a few seconds, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) over time to enemies standing in it.

Allies standing in the flame will be healed (scaling with magical power) instead.

abilities.name: Searing Wings
abilities.details: Fèngyíng releases a cone of fire from her wings, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all enemies caught within it and pushing them back a short distance.

abilities.name: Phoenix Reborn
abilities.details:
Upon activation, Fèngyíng will temporarily die, and become a stationary, invulnerable Flame Egg for a few seconds. She cannot move, attack, or cast abilities in this state.

While in the Flame Egg state, holy fire surrounds her, healing nearby allies over the duration.

After the duration, the egg hatches. Fèngyíng is reborn at the egg's location with a percentage of her maximum health and mana. The rebirth triggers a burst of fire, dealing magical damage (scaling with magical power) to all nearby enemies.
